title: Expecting empty properties to be returned as null values when creating a COMPANY
gherkin:
When the user creates a "COMPANY" "BMW AG" with the following data
  | key  | value  | datatype |
  | name | BMW AG | string   |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key                         | value  | datatype |
  | name                        | BMW AG | string   |
  | founded                     |        | number   |
  | defunct                     |        | number   |
  | headquarters_location       |        | string   |
  | legal_headquarters_location |        | string   |
